formulas.name: emailBodyFormula
formulas.expression: IF({!webcodeBooleanVar}=false, 'The following individual is requesting a Webocde.', 'The following individual tried to register but no Package Products were found OR there was an issue generating the Invoice and Line Items for the Webcode entered.')

formulas.name: installmentBooleanFormula
formulas.expression: IF({!Get_Webcode_Opp.Stop_Installment__c}=false, {!installmentTableVar}, 'Installments are no longer allowed for this trip. Please Pay In Full.')

formulas.name: paymentInstallmentInstructionFormula
formulas.expression: IF({!Get_Webcode_Opp.CloseDate} <= DATEVALUE('2001-01-01'), 'Installments incur a 3% fee.', 'Your trip does not have an installment fee but you can receive a 2% discount for paying in Full today!')

recordUpdates.name: Update_Webcode_Opp_Remove_Payment_Restrictions
recordUpdates.label: Update Webcode Opp Remove Payment Restrictions

fields.name: selectPaymentDisplay
fields.fieldText:
Payment can pay in Installments or in full today. {!paymentInstallmentInstructionFormula} Please select your Payment Schedule.


Refund Protection Guarantee(RGP) is 10% of the Room cost x the number of people in that room.

fields.name: displayLineItems
fields.fieldText:
Your Package Line Items:

{!tableVar}

fields.name: displayPaymentInstructions
fields.fieldText: Once you Click 'Continue to Payment', you may no longer go 'Back' and make changes. You must also be ready to make the selected payment at this time. If you are not ready, do not continue as this may cause issues with your Registration. If you understand and are ready to move forward with payment and registration, please check the box stating you understand before clicking 'Continue to Payment'

validationRule.errorMessage: You must select 'Ready for Payment to Continue

fields.name: displayFullPayment
fields.fieldText:
You have chosen to pay in Full.


Due Today: {!payFullMinus2Percent}

fields.name: displayInstallments
fields.fieldText:
You have chosen to pay Installments.


Due Today: {!firstInstallmentVar}


You will be responsible for {!installmentsMinusOne} more payments totaling {!leftOverInstallmentsFormula}.


{!installmentTableVar}

validationRule.errorMessage: Must be 16 characters or less.
Must be 4 characters or less.

fields.name: Any_Notes_for_the_KSA_Team
fields.fieldText: Any Notes for the KSA Team?

fields.name: failureDsiplay
fields.fieldText: There was a problem with your Registration. You may try again or request to be contacted for support.

fields.name: noWebcodeDisplayText
fields.fieldText: You have not entered a valid Webcode or have not been provided one. To have one sent to you, enter your details and click 'Next', to re-enter the Webcode, click 'Back'.

fields.name: productErrorDisplay
fields.fieldText: There was a problem locating available packages for the Webcode you entered. Please enter your contact information and somebody will reach out to resolve the issue.

fields.name: rpgHeader
fields.fieldText: Refund Protection Guarantee

fields.name: RGPdisplay
fields.fieldText: Refund Guarantee Protection (RGP) is an additional cost per person of 10% of your Land Package. Should a passenger need to cancel their reservation for any reason up to 120 hours prior to your scheduled departure, RGP ensures a full refund of all monies paid less the cost of this option, airfare, and any NSF/Late Fees. The cost of RGP will be reduced from your payment prior to a refund being issued. RGP must be accepted or declined at the time of booking and must be a unanimous decision by each passenger occupying the room. Should you choose to not accept RGP the above stated cancellation policy is rendered inapplicable with no exceptions given. To reiterate, RGP does not cover refunds towards airfare. If you choose to Decline the Refund Guarantee Protection (RGP), please change the selection below:

fields.name: displayChooseFullError
fields.fieldText:
____________________________________________________________________



You Hae passed 60 Days until the Due Date. Installments are no longer available.


____________________________________________________________________

fields.name: displayPaymentFailure
fields.fieldText: Your payment of {!payFormula} was not able to be processed. You may only try 3 total attempts, then must start the registration process over.

fields.name: paymentErrorDisplay
fields.fieldText:
Payment Error: {!Process_Payment.ErrorMessage}

Payment Error Code: {!Process_Payment.ErrorCode}

Payment Error Type: {!Process_Payment.ErrorType}

Payment Result: {!Process_Payment.PaymentResult}

fields.name: displaySchoolWebcode
fields.fieldText:
You have entered the Webcode for the following:


School: {!Get_Webcode_Opp.Account.Name}

Sport/Art: {!Get_Webcode_Opp.KSASport_or_Performing_Art__c}

Arrival Date: {!Get_Webcode_Opp.Arrival_Date__c}

Departure Date: {!Get_Webcode_Opp.Departure_Date__c}


If this is not correct, go Back and re-enter your webcode.


If you need additional help or would like to be contacted by our team, select the checkbox at the bottom of the page and click 'Next'

validationRule.errorMessage: Postal Code must be 6 characters or less.

fields.name: displayEndRegistration
fields.fieldText:
______________________________________________________________




The Registration for this Event has been closed out. You are not able to register online for this event.



______________________________________________________________

fields.name: displaySuccess
fields.fieldText: You have successfully registered {!First_Name} {!Last_Name} for the upcoming {!Get_Updated_Registration.Opportunity__r.KSASport_or_Performing_Art__c} tournament with {!Get_Updated_Registration.Opportunity__r.Account.Name}. You will receive an email confirmation and invoice. Thank you!

fields.name: displayWebcode
fields.fieldText: Do you have a Webcode for this trip? If so, please place it in the field below and remember it is case-sensitive. If not, simply click next.
